穩中求進.definition: to make progress while ensuring stability

穩便.definition: reliable; at one's convenience; as you wish

穩勝.definition: to beat comfortably; to win easily; abbr. for 穩操勝券|稳操胜券, to have victory within one's grasp

穩坐釣魚臺.definition: lit. to sit tight on the fishing terrace despite the storm (idiom); fig. to stay calm in a tense situation

穩壓.definition: stabilized voltage; regulated voltage; steady pressure; regulated pressure

穩如泰山.definition: steady as Mt Tai; as safe as houses

穩定.definition: steady; stable; stability; to stabilize; to pacify

穩定物價.definition: stable prices; commodity prices fixed by government (in a command economy); to valorize (a commodity)

穩恆.definition: steady; stable and permanent; constant; steady-state

穩恆態.definition: steady state; stable and permanent attitude

穩扎穩打.definition: to go steady and strike hard (in fighting); fig. steadily and surely

穩拿.definition: a sure gain; sth one is sure to obtain

穩控.definition: to get (a situation) under control; to stabilize

穩操勝券.definition: grasp it and victory is assured; to have success within one's grasp (idiom)

穩步不前.definition: to mark time and make no advances (idiom)

穩練.definition: steady and proficient; skilled and reliable
